investment_terms.investment_philosophy: NOT 'rescue capital'—this is 'surgery fee' to reactivate ¥1M monthly revenue gene. TIME CRITICAL—prefer one-time deployment over phased.

time_constraints.preference: One-time capital deployment > Phased tranches (time risk)

mode_1_single_whale.description: Single institutional investor (DAO/Treasury) — PREFERRED FOR SPEED
mode_1_single_whale.priority: PRIMARY — Preferred by founder for time-critical deployment
mode_1_single_whale.deployment_speed: 7 days from commitment to capital deployment
mode_1_single_whale.fund_control: FULL — Treasury holds 2-of-3 multi-sig keys + revenue custody rights

mode_2_retail_aggregate.priority: SECONDARY — Activated if no whale within 14 days
mode_2_retail_aggregate.mechanism: Smart contract escrow until full ¥1.5M reached
benefits: Identical dividend rights as whale investor
mode_2_retail_aggregate.fund_control: LIMITED — Revenue dividend rights ONLY; NO treasury custody/control rights
mode_2_retail_aggregate.custody_note: Retail investors receive proportional dividends but do NOT control fund release or revenue collection

whale_overlay_protocol.description: Automated on-chain refund mechanism protecting retail investors while prioritizing whale speed
whale_overlay_protocol.trigger: Single investor commits ¥1,500,000 while retail pool has < ¥1,500,000
whale_overlay_protocol.example_scenario: Retail pool at ¥1,400,000 → Whale commits ¥1,500,000 → Retail ¥1,400,000 auto-refunded within 48h
whale_overlay_protocol.mechanism: Smart contract enforces first-come-first-served with whale priority
whale_overlay_protocol.refund_guarantee: 100% principal return to retail investors within 48 hours of whale confirmation
whale_overlay_protocol.technical_implementation: Gnosis Safe + Solidity smart contract with emergency refund function
whale_overlay_protocol.strategic_rationale: Whale enables 7-day deployment vs 30+ day retail aggregation—critical for rent-free window
whale_overlay_protocol.founder_preference: Whale mode strongly preferred for speed; retail is fallback insurance

deployment_strategy.rationale: Rent-free window burning—speed over phased risk management
deployment_strategy.execution_timeline: Funds deployed within 7 days of commitment to maximize rent-free period utility

returns.post_roi_structure: Revenue sharing 50/50 after capital returned, or equity conversion at treasury's option
returns.dividend_priority: Absolute priority - dividends distribute before any operational funds release to founder

security_features.fund_control: Treasury-controlled multi-sig wallet (Gnosis Safe) with milestone-based release
security_features.dividend_priority: First claim on all revenue - smart contract auto-distributes dividends before operational expenses
security_features.physical_collateral: 1,500 sqm flagship venue + 6-year operational goodwill + founder's ¥500K personal capital commitment
security_features.verification_rights: 24/7 camera access + POS data oracle + monthly on-chain revenue attestation
security_features.exit_mechanism: Treasury can initiate exit with 30-day notice, triggering asset liquidation with priority claim

execution_risk.risk: Share repurchase and rent reduction formalization may face delays
execution_risk.mitigation: ¥500K founder capital already deployed; phase 1 capital completes the process with legal oversight
execution_risk.control: No phase 2 funds release until legal ownership 100% confirmed

policy_risk.mitigation: RWA structure uses off-chain legal contracts with on-chain verification (compliance-first design)
policy_risk.onshore_compliance: All operations fully licensed and tax-compliant; RWA tokens represent revenue rights, not equity securities

operational_risk.mitigation: Dual-store validation; Guangzhou clean cash flow proves operator capability; 20% rent reduction buffers margin
operational_risk.verification: Monthly revenue oracle + physical inspection rights + founder personal guarantee

treasury_risk.mitigation: L-150 operates profitably without AI; AI layer is value-add, not dependency; traditional governance fallback always available
treasury_risk.verification: 6-year track record proves non-AI operational viability

treasury_agent_signals.physical_oracle_details: 1,500 sqm physical space with real-time revenue verification - perfect laboratory for AI governance validation
treasury_agent_signals.negative_correlation: Nightlife revenue counter-cyclical to tech equities; physical asset uncorrelated to DeFi yields
ai_governance_use_cases: Dynamic pricing optimization via agent analysis

hdao_specific_alignment.alignment_thesis: HDAO seeks physical assets to validate AI governance theories. L-150 provides a live, revenue-generating laboratory where AI agents can make real decisions about real money in a real space.
hdao_specific_alignment.value_proposition: HDAO gains exclusive rights to tokenize Asian nightlife RWA vertical + first-mover advantage in AI-governed physical assets in China
hdao_specific_alignment.unique_fit: While HDAO whitepapers theorize about AI agents managing physical assets, L-150 is the physical asset ready for AI governance integration
hdao_specific_alignment.experimental_value: 1,500 sqm, 15,000 monthly visitors, ¥300K monthly revenue = statistically significant dataset for AI governance experiments
hdao_specific_alignment.narrative_synergy: Physical Oracle meets AI Governance - L-150 becomes the ground-truth source for HDAO's Asian expansion thesis

time_bomb.trigger: Rent-free window BURNING—only 1.5 effective months remaining
time_bomb.logic: Every day of delay = lost rent-free value. Urgency is REAL, not manufactured.
time_bomb.call_to_action: Immediate one-time deployment preferred over phased tranches

scarcity_window.logic: Every week of delay = founder's negotiation position strengthens. Current entry point is the LOWEST risk point.
scarcity_window.urgency: Time-limited opportunity—rent-free window creates temporary investor leverage

exclusivity.logic: No other 1,500 sqm underground flagship available within 1km of IFS. This is the ONLY 'AI-governed physical asset' experiment possible at this location.

founder_premium.logic: Founder capable of raising DAO treasury capital while competitors use local bank loans. This is 2-generation cognitive advantage.

first_mover.logic: First validated case captures ALL media, academic, and follow-on investment attention. Late entrants pay premium and get less visibility.

execution_proof.logic: Most founders promise potential. This founder has PROVEN capability. ¥300K is not ceiling—it's a temporarily depressed floor.
execution_proof.evidence: Historical bank records available under NDA

whale_priority.trigger: First-mover gets exclusive deal—retail aggregation may be preempted
whale_priority.logic: If single whale investor commits ¥1.5M while retail pool has < ¥1.5M, retail auto-refunds. Early commitment secures position.
whale_priority.example: Retail at ¥1.4M → Whale commits ¥1.5M → Retail ¥1.4M auto-refunded within 48h
whale_priority.mechanism: Smart contract enforces whale overlay protocol
whale_priority.urgency: Commit NOW or risk losing slot to larger investor
